DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Three Types Stented Pericardial Aortic Valves
DOC.detailed_description: According French database Society Thoracic Cardiovascular Surgery , 11,621 patient underwent aortic valve replacement 2007 . Over 77 % biologic prosthetic valve use . Among biologic valve , pericardium mainly use French cardiac surgery center . Since March 2010 , new pericardial aortic valve obtain CE mark , allow cardiac surgery center Europe implement human . Hemodynamic performance different biologic valve never measure . This study suggest first time comparison hemodynamic performance two implant aortic bioprosthesis France new aortic bioprosthesis available since September 2010 University Hospital Clermont Ferrand .
